Big City Apps is a complete source of IT & Creative solutions that brings to market new and innovative services, apps, projects etc.. The company specializes in the creative thinking and efficient development processes and it is proudly represented by a talented team of professionals with experience in fields such as: programming, management, communication, marketing, sales, business analysis and strategy.
At Big City Apps we develop not only apps for iOS and Android, but also numerous websites, platforms and even customized software.
